items.sentence: Tom should probably spend more time with Mary.
Tom tried to make sense of what just happened.
Tom didn\'t tell his parents where he\'d been.
It isn\'t my place to question Tom\'s methods.
I have no intention of staying here in Boston.
I have no will power when it comes to dieting.
This is where Tom met Mary for the first time.
This kind of food is really popular in Boston.
Tom said that Mary has always lived in Boston.
Tom was sentenced to one year of house arrest.
